control_attributes.Control: IA-8 (1) ACCEPTANCE OF PIV CREDENTIALS FROM OTHER AGENCIES
control_attributes.control_description: The information system accepts and electronically verifies Personal Identity Verification (PIV) credentials from other federal agencies.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires users and devices to re-authenticate when [Assignment: organization-defined circumstances or situations requiring re-authentication].

Control Statement: The information system accepts and electronically verifies Personal Identity Verification (PIV) credentials from other federal agencies.
Control Name: IA-8 (1) ACCEPTANCE OF PIV CREDENTIALS FROM OTHER AGENCIES
